entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight and ending overnight then clearing. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
